name: Poltergeists on Floor 12
overview: Poltergeists on Floor 12 is a pseudo 3D vertical shooter made by Bamse using the shoot 'em Up Construction Kit. It was released as part of the 2010 Vertical Scorlling SEUCK Competition. Game description: You are Bamse. You walk the haunted floor of a spooky hotel to rid it off all evil. Concentrate on your CHI, the centre of your mental strength. Move it around to aim and avoid ghosts! Try to catch inspiration in the shape of butterflies to be granted extras. Like all of God's children you have one, and one life only to spend ...
